content: Hi. When and where will you be announcing the winners of the student track hackathon?

The site led me here. Just thought someone here would know.
https://www.the-hackfest.com/events/devdays-student-track-online-hackathon/
Typically the winners get announced on the final day of DevDays

Hi Rome, we invite three nominated student teams to DevDays who will present their work on June 11th in Redmond. Afterwards the final winner will be announced. We are informing the nominated teams by mail this week. We will announce them on our website soon, probably somewhere next week.
